title: Jonathan Ashworth – 2021 Comments on Children’s Operations Being Cancelled
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jonathan Ashworth, the Secretary of State for Health and Social Care, on 1 February 2021.
content: Reports that urgent children’s operations have been cancelled is deeply alarming; it puts children’s health at risk and reveals the intensity of pressure on the NHS in this wave.
Years of cutbacks, understaffing and underfunding left our NHS vulnerable heading into this pandemic and now swathes of vital non-Covid care are cancelled.
Children must not become the forgotten victims of this crisis. Child health and well-being must always be a priority.
